title: These large-caps have ‘strong buy’ & ‘buy’ recos and an upside potential of up to 25%
summary: At a time when the Indian markets are dealing with confusion and lack of clarity on many fronts, it may be better for investors to have a twin strategy. Select a stock where it would pay off to be bullish, but also keep some powder dry for a day to buy them – a day when panic is triggered on the market. The twin strategy may work better for a simple reason. In the short term, there are many factors suggesting a higher probability of the volatility quotient remaining high. It is better to use volatility as a tool rather than be scared of it.

title: Volatility in the market: Sit out or learn to be logically contrarian? 5 mid-caps from different sectors with upside potential of up to 32%
summary: Brace yourself for more volatility, reset your expectations, and get ready to look for opportunities. This is what you need to do in the next 90 days. Why 90 days? For two reasons, the first global and the second local. There are many global issues which have been lingering for more than a year; so, either we have solutions for them or they aggravate. For instance, the Ukraine war: Either it gets over or it intensifies. The domestic reason: Post-January we enter a phase where normally liquidity is tighter. But then if you thought investing is for three months, then you are in the wrong vocation.
